title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Mathematical Leadership Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will be able to proactively design mathematical problem-solving processes at an 80%+ rate using gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards)
Learners can progressively acquire mathematical concepts at level 4 or higher (e.g., fraction operations, ratio comprehension) through a level-up system
Learners can develop competencies by performing at least three formative assessments through peer feedback and collaborative quests in a digital learning environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
